Reviews.Title: “A real bargain downtown”
Reviews.Author: ahl899
Reviews.Content: reading reviews cant figure people expecting accommodations 12 price hotels downtown montreal charming clean ac tv fine steps metro edge downtown quiet safe restful convenient stay people expecting 3 4 star quality choose pay real gem bargain

Reviews.Title: “If you want cheap and kinda clean, steps from the Bell Centre, this is the place.”

Reviews.Content: definitely cheap located steps bell centre bars night clubs shopping restaurantsbut isnt comfortable husband recently ufc managed hockey game love montreal usually stay friends hand relatives staying time location price spend couple extra bucks stay nice cleanliness size broom closet atmosphere none quality am princess means pretty nasty blankets bed afraid stand shower cottage raise arms drop pick miniature air conditioner held wall duct tape cleaning constantly whatever cleaning overwhelming smell bad happening tying cover stench breakfast coffee toast guys heading game planning drunk stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly nice little hotel!”
Reviews.Author: mrsdeb
Reviews.Content: hotel closer bell centre inside doors receptionist cafe attendant pleasant helpful tiny clean reasonable parking lot close spacious extra wasnt luxurious perfectly nice little hotel definitely stay
